import'./projetos-inicio.css';import'../textsFormate/formate.css';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{useEffect}from'react';import AOS from'aos';import'aos/dist/aos.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProjetosInicio(){const location=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{AOS.init({duration:1000,once:true});},[]);// Função para definir os textos baseado na rota
const getTitles=()=>{switch(location.pathname){case'/projetos':return{subtitle:'Meus',title:'Projetos'};case'/contato':return{subtitle:'Entre em',title:'Contato'};default:return{subtitle:'',title:''};}};const{subtitle,title}=getTitles();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pagina-banner projetos",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"apresentacao-projetos",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"themeWhite","data-aos":"fade","data-aos-delay":"100",children:subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"themeOrange","data-aos":"fade","data-aos-delay":"300",children:title})]})});}export default ProjetosInicio;
